improvements: Improved error handling to support different types of error objects
Enhanced archive data validation and error handling
Added multi-language text for archive operations
Optimized virtual list rendering performance with fallback mechanism
bugFixes: Fixed auto-feedback default state logic from enabled by default to disabled by default
Fixed variable reference issues in event bindings
